channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Says He's Pulling His Endorsement of 'Wacky' Marjorie Taylor Greene: 'I Can't Take a Ranting Lunatic's Call Every Day'
item.description: Greene responded to Trump on X, saying that his "attack" comes after she demanded he release files related to convicted sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein

item.title: Teresa Giudice Makes Shocking Announcement That She Made Up with Joe and Melissa Gorga After Years of Feuding
item.description: Giudice was seen hugging her brother in a viral clip from BravoCon 2025

item.title: Kourtney Kardashian Says Travis Barker Inspires Her 'Every Single Day to Be a Better Person' in 50th Birthday Tribute
item.description: "I love you beyond any words could ever tell," the reality TV star wrote

item.title: Machine Gun Kelly Recreates “Harry Potter ”Butterbeer Photo with Daughter 11 Years Later
item.description: The musician and dad shared the nostalgic moment from a trip to Universal Orlando on Instagram

item.title: Tom Brady's New York City Store Robbed of Nearly $10,000 in Pokémon and Baseball Cards
item.description: The Super Bowl champion's store was robbed less than two weeks after it opened

item.title: Blair Underwood Says He's Raising Bison Herd Like Cattle
